Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Proxy_s

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Proxy_s
All Implemented Interfaces:
Exit
public class Proxy_s extends Object implements Exit
Proxy_s is server's proxy, it manages connections with clients and excess connections.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Proxy_s(int port, Entrance server)
    Create ServerSocket.
